thi-ap25:3.1: 5 Nandātherīapadāna → nandājanapadakalyāṇī apadānaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | sundarīnandātherī apadānaṃ (aṭṭha.)
thi-ap25:19.2: gatā → agaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr), tato → gatā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap25:38.1: Na vañcakālo subhage → na pañhakālo subhage (bj) | na pañhakālo subhaṇe (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na pañhakālo subhage (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap25:45.3: Doḷālolāva → doḷālolā ca (bj) | dāmāmālañca (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dolālocā ca (pts-vp-pli1ed) | dololullāva (mr)
thi-ap25:47.1: Vedimajjhāva sussoṇī → tanumajjhā puthussoṇī (bj) | vedimajjhā puthussoṇi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vedimajjhā puthussoṇī (pts-vp-pli1ed)
